description: This file contains Pydantic data models used for API request and response schemas in a Tic-Tac-Toe game backend, including user authentication, game state management, moves, and game history.

classes.name: UserOut
classes.description: Schema for public user info output.

classes.name: StartGameRequest
classes.description: Schema for requesting to start a new game.

classes.name: StartGameResponse
classes.description: Schema for response after starting a new game.

classes.name: MoveRequest
classes.description: Schema for making a move request.

classes.name: MoveEntry
classes.description: Schema representing a move's details in game history.

classes.name: HistoryEntry
classes.description: Schema representing a historical game record.

classes.name: GameHistoryResponse
classes.description: Schema for response listing game histories.

methods.name: model_rebuild
methods.description: Rebuilds the Pydantic model for GameStateResponse after class definition, ensuring correct model parsing.

ctags.name: Config
ctags.pattern: /^    class Config:$/

ctags.name: GameHistoryResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class GameHistoryResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: GameStateResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class GameStateResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: HistoryEntry
ctags.pattern: /^class HistoryEntry(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: MoveEntry
ctags.pattern: /^class MoveEntry(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: MoveRequest
ctags.pattern: /^class MoveRequest(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: MoveResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class MoveResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: StartGameRequest
ctags.pattern: /^class StartGameRequest(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: StartGameResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class StartGameResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: Token
ctags.pattern: /^class Token(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: UserCreate
ctags.pattern: /^class UserCreate(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: UserLogin
ctags.pattern: /^class UserLogin(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: UserOut
ctags.pattern: /^class UserOut(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: access_token
ctags.pattern: /^    access_token: str = Field(..., description="JWT Bearer token")$/

ctags.name: board
ctags.pattern: /^    board: List[List[Optional[str]]] = Field(..., description="3x3 board after the move")$/

ctags.name: col
ctags.pattern: /^    col: int = Field(..., ge=0, le=2, description="Col (0-2)")$/

ctags.name: email
ctags.pattern: /^    email: EmailStr = Field(..., description="User email address")$/

ctags.name: game_mode
ctags.pattern: /^    game_mode: str = Field("vs_player", description="Game mode: 'vs_player' or 'vs_computer'")$/

ctags.name: is_draw
ctags.pattern: /^    is_draw: bool = Field(..., description="Game ended in a draw?")$/

ctags.name: opponent_username
ctags.pattern: /^    opponent_username: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="If vs player mode, provide oppon/

ctags.name: orm_mode
ctags.pattern: /^        orm_mode = True$/

ctags.name: password
ctags.pattern: /^    password: str = Field(..., min_length=6, description="Account password, min 6 characters")$/

ctags.name: password
ctags.pattern: /^    password: str = Field(..., min_length=6, description="Your password")$/

ctags.name: row
ctags.pattern: /^    row: int = Field(..., ge=0, le=2, description="Row (0-2)")$/

ctags.name: token_type
ctags.pattern: /^    token_type: str = Field("bearer", description="Token type (always bearer)")$/

ctags.name: username
ctags.pattern: /^    username: str = Field(..., min_length=3, max_length=32, description="Unique username (case-i/

ctags.name: username
ctags.pattern: /^    username: str = Field(..., min_length=3, max_length=32, description="Your username")$/

ctags.name: winner
ctags.pattern: /^    winner: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Username of the winner if game ended, else /
